Description: Opaque blue glass figure of ram; socket in top of head; boring behind forelegs.
Curator's comments: Published: H. Tait, Five Thousand Years of Glass, (BM 1991), fig.50. Shaw and Nicholson, BM Dictionary of Ancient Egypt, 1995, p.181. J. Dayton, Minerals, Metals, Glazing and Man, 1978, pl.30,2.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.50)
Acquisition name: Donated by: J J Stevenson (Trustees of)
